item.title: Blaze Pizza
item.description:
Rating: 5 Star

Fired pizza is always my favarite, and their garlic pesto sauce opened a new world for me. It is amazing! Besides the based sauce, I would recommend ordering their pizza with unlimited toppings. Their artichokes is on my topping list all the time. My sense of happiness goes up and up when holding a slice of pizza on Friday night. :)

BTW this pizza store is funded by LeBron James.

Tips: Online specials worth a try!

Website

item.title: Domino's
item.description:
Rating: 4 Star

Domino’s is the cheapest pizza I have ever had in US. Its brooklin style has thin crust like a cookie. It provides many coupons that covers all types of pizzas and chicken wings. It’s hand-made pizza claimed to use dough that has never been frosen.

Tips: It only takes $40 to Purchase a $50 gift card.

Website

item.title: Fresh Brothers
item.description:
Rating: 4 Star

Despite its delicious pizza, I’d like to praise its fresh yummy chicken wings and its special mongo habanero sauce!

Tips: Online specials worth a try!

Website

item.title: Panera Bread
item.description:
Rating: 4 Star

I love to have Panera bread as dinner when too lazy to cook. It’s supper efficient and delicious as well! My choice is always the “You Pick Two” combo:

Chipotle Chicken & Bacon Flatbread Pizza
with Extra Cilantro
with Extra Red Grape Tomatoes
with Light Garlic Cream Sauce
with Light Choipotle Aioli

Half Sandwich (depends on that day’s mood)
with Tomato Basil Bread
with Cucumber
with Arugula
with Light Chipotle Sauce
with Light Salt & Pepper
with Cilantro
with Emerald Greens

Besides these 2 entrees, their chips and Baguette is also worth a try!

Tips: Purchse a $50 giftcard will give you extra $10!

Website
